#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stack>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
#include<queue>
#include<deque>
#include<list>
#define nik long long int
inline nik ashu()
{
     nik n=0,neg=0,c=getchar_unlocked();
     while((c<'0'||c>'9')&&c!='-')c=getchar_unlocked();
     if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=getchar_unlocked();}
     while(c>='0'&&c<='9')n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0',c=getchar_unlocked();
     if(neg) n=-n;
     return n;
}
int main() 
{
    nik t=ashu();
    while(t--)
    {
       string str;
       getline(cin,str);
       nik i,ans=0,m=1;
       int l=str.length();
       for(i=l-1;i>=0;i--)
       {
            if(str[i]>='0'&&str[i]<='9')
            {
                nik s=str[i]-48;
                ans+=m*s;
                m*=10;
            }   
            else
             m=1;        
       }
       printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
	return 0;
}
